item.title: Crew Oxygen System – Supernumerary Oxygen Masks Below 10,000

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided flight is not conducted above 10,000 feet MSL.

numlitem.para: Flight is not conducted above 10,000 feet MSL.

placard.para: Placard near upper EICAS "OXYGEN SYSTEM EMPTY" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
